Council tax charges 2025 to 2026

These are the annual council tax charges for properties in Gloucester for 2025/26.

Band Property value (1991) Total annual charge
Band A Up to ¬£40,000 ¬£1,492.52
Band B ¬£40,001 to ¬£52,000 ¬£1,741.26
Band C ¬£52,001 to ¬£68,000 ¬£1,990.01
Band D ¬£68,001 to ¬£88,000 ¬£2,238.77
Band E ¬£88,001 to ¬£120,000 ¬£2,736.28
Band F ¬£120,001 to ¬£160,000 ¬£3,233.78
Band G ¬£160,001 to ¬£320,000 ¬£3,731.29
Band H Over ¬£320,000 ¬£4,477.54

2025/26 increases:
Gloucester City Council increased by 3%, Gloucestershire County Council by 5% (including adult social care), and the Police and Crime Commissioner by 4.5%. The average increase is 4.7%, which is ¬£6.68 per year or ¬£0.13 per week for Band D properties.

How council tax bands work

Properties are put into bands by the Valuation Office Agency (VOA) based on what the property was worth on 1 April 1991.

The amount you pay does not change if your property is worth more now. Bands are based on 1991 values.

Check your property's band

You can check which band your property is in on the Valuation Office Agency website.

Check your band on GOV.UK

Challenge your band

If you think your property is in the wrong band, you can challenge it. You need to contact the Valuation Office Agency, not the council.

When you can challenge

  • You've just become the owner or tenant
  • Your property has changed (for example, been demolished or split into flats)
  • The area around your property has changed (for example, a new road)
  • A similar property nearby is in a different band

Important: You cannot challenge your band just because you think it's too high. Bands are relative to 1991 property values.

Challenge your band

How your bill is calculated

Your council tax bill is based on:

  • Your property's band
  • Whether you get any discounts or exemptions
  • Whether you qualify for Council Tax Support

The standard bill assumes at least 2 adults aged 18 or over live in the property. If fewer adults live there, you may qualify for a discount.

Check if you qualify for a discount
